plays.text: Penalty to Christian Laflamme 2 minutes for Hooking Wayne Primeau
Penalty to Michal Rozsival 2 minutes for Crosschecking Steve Dubinsky
Penalty to Jan Hrdina 2 minutes for Hooking Shjon Podein
Penalty to Steve Dubinsky 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Sebastien Caron
Goal scored by Rico Fata assisted by Wayne Primeau
Goal scored by Pavol Demitra assisted by Keith Tkachuk and Al MacInnis
Penalty to Barret Jackman 2 minutes for Tripping Shean Donovan
Penalty to Jamie Pushor 2 minutes for Interference Keith Tkachuk
Penalty to Eric Boguniecki 2 minutes for Hooking Mikael Samuelsson
Penalty to Mikael Samuelsson 2 minutes for Diving Eric Boguniecki
Goal scored by Shawn Heins assisted by Mario Lemieux and Martin Straka
